thread.title: Guernsey airport's new mobile website | Channel
thread.title_full: Guernsey airport's new mobile website | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Guernsey airport's new mobile website | Channel
text:
Guernsey Airport's website has been redesigned for mobile users.
The airport acknowledged people want to check for flight updates on their phone before they fly or whilst waiting for friends and family to arrive.
The website can now be checked equally well on desktops, laptops, tablets and mobiles with arrivals, departures and weather being updates every 60 seconds.
Last updated Wed 2 Sep 2015 Travel Guernsey
